question:
You saw an advertisement for a tennis course in England but you have some problems and can’t stay for the whole course.Write a letter to the course director. In your letter,explain your interest in the coursedescribe your problemsfind out whether a refund is possible if you leave earlyWrite at least 150 words.
You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: This letter is being written to enquire some details about the tennis court that you are holding. I would specifically like to know if a partial refund is possible for people who cannot complete the whole course?

I have recently noticed your advert in a daily newspaper about a short-term tennis course. Being a passionate learner of sports, I really want to get enrolled in it. As the course is for intermediate players  I think it would be beneficial for me.

However, there are some issues that I want to discuss before  enrollment. Firstly, it is from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. according to your advert,nevertless, it is not possible for me to join the class before 5:30 p.m. because I have a full time job. Is there any option to it adjust the timings? Besides, I probably have to travel to Sydney,Australia during a course for almost 3 months. As a result, I would not be able to complete the course. Considering this, will I get a refund in such a case? What is the refund policy? Finally, I request you to email the required document checklist.
